InstaVM, a platform for local-first, secure, AI-driven code execution."]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Core Principle:"}]," Eliminate cloud dependency for LLM inference and code execution to ensure ",["$","code","code-0",{"children":"assistant-ui"}]," for chat interface."]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"LLM Host:"}]," Ollama for running local execution, considered more secure than standard Docker for this use case."]}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Orchestration:"}]," A custom ",["$","code","code-0",{"children":"coderunner"}]," service."]}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Tool Protocol:"}]," A Jupyter server and Playwright are deployed within the container and exposed as tools over MCP (Model Context Protocol), making them accessible to compatible clients (e.g., Gemini CLI, Claude Desktop)."]}],"\n",["$","li","li-5",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"File System:"}]," A host volume (",["$","code","code-0",{"children":"~/.coderunner/assets"}],") is mapped into the container for persistent storage, ensuring generated files are accessible without exposing the host system to the execution environment."]}],"\n"]}],"\n"]}],"\n","$L10","\n","$L11","\n","$L12","\n"]}]]}]]}],"$L13"]}]}]]}]

Tool:"}]," The article focuses on \"Claude Code,\" a terminal-based AI assistant from Anthropic."]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Methodology (\"Vibe Coding\"):"}],"\n",["$","ul","ul-0",{"children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Refers to developing applications via natural language prompts without directly writing code."}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"The author finds that detailed specifications and simple, vanilla tech stacks (e.g., a single PHP file, raw SQL) yield the best results. Complex frameworks often lead to over-engineered, non-functional outputs."}],"\n"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Use Cases & Experiments:"}],"\n",["$","ul","ul-0",{"children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"CRUD App Generation:"}]," Successfully generated a functional SplitWise clone from a detailed spec file. A prompt specifying a simple PHP/SQL stack worked, while a less constrained prompt produced a broken, dependency-heavy NodeJS project."]}],"\n","$L14","\n","$L15","\n","$L16","\n","$L17","\n"]}],"\n"]}],"\n","$L18","\n"]}]]}]]}]
14:["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Autonomous Agent:"}]," Deployed on a root VPS with a looping script to build a \"startup.\" The agent self-prompted, chose an idea (server monitoring), and deployed a full-stack web application with Nginx. It required a ",["$","code","code-0",{"children":"HUMAN_INPUT.md"}]," file for human guidance and was blocked by usage policies when attempting automated marketing."]}]
15:["$","li","li-2",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Production Migration:"}]," Migrated an unfamiliar Laravel/PHP/MySQL application to a new server. The tool analyzed the codebase to generate a ",["$","code","code-0",{"children":"README"}],", then executed the setup and migration, saving an estimated 16-32 hours of manual effort despite some errors (e.g., dropping a database)."]}]
